cwe.Description: This weakness has been deprecated because its name and description did not match. The description duplicated CWE-454, while the name suggested a more abstract initialization problem. Please refer to CWE-665 for the more abstract problem.

xhtml:p: Use for Mapping: Prohibited (this CWE ID must not be used to map to real-world vulnerabilities).
Comments: see description for suggestions for other CWE IDs to use.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Submitted by members of the CWE community to extend early CWE versions
